entry.title: [BHS5/BHS7][Infrastructure] - Electrical background work
entry.content:
Apr 10, 21:02 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All the services are now operational.

Apr 10, 11:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 1, 20:14 UTC
Update - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 10/04/2025 11:00 UTC
End time : 10/04/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers might be temporarily unavailable during 20 minutes.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing an electrical maintenance.
The operation is carried out in several steps:
Step 1 : From 11:00 UTC to 11:30 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers
Step 2 : From 11:30 to 20:30 UTC
Step 3 : From 20:30 UTC to 21:00 UTC, this step may temporarily affect Availability of servers

Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS5 are T05A, T05B, T05C, T05D, T05E, T05F, T05G and T05H
Rooms where you may experience unavailability on BHS7 are B710 and B716

Our technical teams will be mobilized throughout the maintenance to resolve any impact on your services.

We apologize in advance for any inconvenience caused.

entry.title: [IT][Network] - Italy services incident notification
entry.content:
Apr 10, 13:51 UTC
Resolved - We experienced an incident that affected the Network infrastructure, causing temporary availability issues in Italy.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 10/04/2025 08:50 UTC
End time : 10/04/2025 11:45 UTC
Impacted Service : The services located in Italy may have had some malfunction
Customers Impact : Customers located in Italy might have encountered intermittent loss of connectivity when they wanted to use their services.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a malfunction on a provider's infrastructure.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
